params._amount: Amount of tokens to be burned
params._from: Address from which tokens will be burned

returns.success: Indicates whether the operation was successful

params._amount: Amount of tokens to be minted
params._to: Address to which tokens will be minted

returns.success: Indicates whether the operation was successful

burn(address,uint256).notice: Burns tokens from a specified account

mint(address,uint256).notice: Mints tokens to a specified account
